subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: With three races to go, only 38 points separate Jimmie Johnson, Denny Hamlin and Kevin Harvick in Nascar’s Chase for the Sprint Cup.
snippet: With three races to go, only 38 points separate Jimmie Johnson, Denny Hamlin and Kevin Harvick in Nascar’s Chase for the Sprint Cup.
